text: Daphne thinks the rubber-band method is clever, but she believes the school copier can make more accurate copies in a greater variety of sizes. She makes a copy of Super Sleuth with two different percent size multipliers. The results are shown here.

• What percent size multiplier did Daphne use to create Copy 1 and Copy 2? Explain your reasoning.
  • How are the copies like the original? How are they different?

Be sure to include comparisons of the shape and different measures.
